vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰεσσαί (FlJ, -σσαῖος), ὁ (Heb. יִשַׁי Rut.4:17, al.)
Jesse: Mat.1:5-6, Luk.3:32, Act.13:22" (LXX), Rom.15:12 (LXX),†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.4.17;
son of: Obed (H5744);
father of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
§ Jesse, father of David (1Sam. 16), (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:5f.; Lk. 3:32; Acts 13:22; Rom. 15:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶西 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "富有的,豐裕的"
大衛王的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶西 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "富有的,丰裕的"
大卫王的父亲
